name: Zeichnet achte Kriegsanleihe LCCN2004666161 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Zeichnet achte Kriegsanleihe Abstract: Poster shows a winged goddess, in a chariot pulled by four horses, holding a laurel wreath as she crushes three dragons. Text: Subscribe to the 8th War Loan. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 56 x 78 cm. Notes: M. Lenz.; Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Title from item.
